GOAT fps, best of its kind economy-based tactical 5 vs 5 shooter. Has potential for great tactical depth and rewards teamwork as well as individual skill. Nothing feels the same way as one-deaging the life out of someone far away or getting a 1st bullet headshot in general. Can be painful to play if teammates are doo doo or if the enemy team has cheaters, which is still a problem even on the highest rank. Overall very nice I like a lot very good game :D

Very simple game but hard to master. Unfortunately lots of cheaters even at the highest ranks.  Despite that very fun casually, very competitive as well, you will progress a lot with every hour/day you play and if you get some friend to make a pre-made that's just perfect. 
Advice: Try to not stress to much with the cheaters and have fun.

A Great classic game and if you love competitive FPS games I am not sure why you have not tried it yet. At times the game can be frustrating and cheaters can be prevalent. Overall if you are a good member of the steam community and CS:GO community you will have what is called a high trust which basically means you will play with other good and friendly players and much less cheaters. Overall a good game and definitely worth playing.
